lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy came within a whisker of making the first albatross of his career but had to settle for an eagle at the par-five 18th in the third round at the Deutsche Bank Championship in Massachusetts on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: McIlroy Almost Has First Albatross at TPC Boston
headline.main: McIlroy Almost Has First Albatross at TPC Boston

snippet: Rory McIlroy came within a whisker of making the first albatross of his career but had to settle for an eagle at the par-five 18th in the third round at the Deutsche Bank Championship in Massachusetts on Sunday....
